ingredients.ingredient: 2 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened baking chocolate, melted and cooled
1 prepared 8 inch pastry shell, baked and cooled

cookingTips: Use raw eggs in this recipe, so source high-quality fresh eggs from reliable sources
Whip the butter and chocolate mixture until very light and fluffy for the signature texture
The filling will set as it cools, so patience is key
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This pie uses raw eggs for authentic French silk texture. Are you comfortable with food safety considerations?
